name: Chicken Pad See Ew (Thai Stir Fried Noodles)
description: A quick and easy recipe for chicken pad see ew, perfect for every home cook and ready in 20 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 3.5 ounces Chinese broccoli (peel stems and slice thinly, leaves chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the fresh wide rice noodles with dark soy sauce until evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the fresh wide rice noodles with dark soy sauce until evenly coated.

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the Chinese broccoli and sliced carrots in boiling water for 30 seconds, then remove them from the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Blanch the Chinese broccoli and sliced carrots in boiling water for 30 seconds, then remove them from the water.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then cook the chicken until fully cooked. Remove the chicken and set it aside, leaving the oil in the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then cook the chicken until fully cooked. Remove the chicken and set it aside, leaving the oil in the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic to the same pan and sauté until golden brown and fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic to the same pan and sauté until golden brown and fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Break the eggs into the pan and scramble them until fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Break the eggs into the pan and scramble them until fully cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wide rice noodles into the pan along with oyster sauce, white pepper, white sugar, and rosdee seasoning powder. Stir well and cook until the noodles are soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wide rice noodles into the pan along with oyster sauce, white pepper, white sugar, and rosdee seasoning powder. Stir well and cook until the noodles are soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the previously cooked vegetables and chicken to the pan. Stir everything together to combine, then serve immediately. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the previously cooked vegetables and chicken to the pan. Stir everything together to combine, then serve immediately. Enjoy!

review.reviewBody: Your recipes are always so detailed and easy to make. This pad see ew is one of my favorites.

keywords: chicken noodles, chicken pad see ew
